info.title: ReThink API Documentation
info.description: API for a comprehensive sustainability app featuring a community page, events, volunteering opportunities, a carbon footprint calculator, and insightful articles. Join us in making a positive environmental impact and fostering a greener future.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user profiles, including creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting user information.

tags.name: Staff
tags.description: Endpoints for managing staff members, including adding new staff, updating staff details, and retrieving staff information.

tags.name: Carbon Footprint Calculator
tags.description: Endpoints for calculating and managing carbon footprint data, including submitting user data and retrieving calculated results.

tags.name: Community Forum Posts
tags.description: Endpoints for managing posts in the community forum, including creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting forum posts and comments.

tags.name: Community Forum Topics
tags.description: Endpoints for managing topics in the community forum, including creating, retrieving, and deleting forum topics.

tags.name: Commnity Events
tags.description: Endpoints for managing community events, including creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting event information.

tags.name: Payment for Donations
tags.description: Endpoints for handling payment processes related to community donations, including initiating payments and processing donation transactions.

tags.name: Reports
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving and deleting post and comment reports.

tags.name: Messages
tags.description: Endpoints for managing messages, including sending, retrieving, and deleting messages.

tags.name: Replies
tags.description: Endpoints for managing replies, including retrieving and adding replies.

tags.name: Articles
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing and searching articles
